events.name: Glam Rock Night!

events.name: One Massive Hit - Then Zilch!
events.description: They all had 1 massive song, then never skirted the UK Top 20 singles chart again! Here are 70 acts from every year of the 70s, in order, who all achieved their 15 minutes of fame.
